text: The Chinese ambassador in Port Moresby is the official representative of the government in Beijing to the Government of the Papua New Guinea. ==List of representatives== {| class="wikitable sortable" !| Diplomatic agrément/Diplomatic accreditation !| Ambassador !| Chinese language :zh:中国驻巴布亚新几内亚大使列表 !| Observations !| Premier of the People's Republic of China !| Prime Minister of Papua New Guinea !| Term end |- | |Pei Jianzhang |:zh:裴坚章 |Residence in Welington, *From September 1979 to November 1984 he was ambassador in Tripoli |Hua Guofeng |Michael Somare | |- | |Lin Ping |:zh:林平 |Residence in Canberra. *From 1971 to he was ambassador in Santiago de Chile. * Since 1978 he was ambassador to Canberra. |Zhao Ziyang |Julius Chan | |- | |Hu Hongfan |:zh:胡洪范 |1985-1988 was ambassador in Caracas. |Zhao Ziyang |Michael Somare | |- | |Gao Jianzhong |:zh:高建中 |1988 1993 was ambassador to Sierra Leone. |Zhao Ziyang |Paias Wingti | |- | |Zhao Wei (PRC diplomat) |赵维 | |Li Peng |Rabbie Namaliu | |- | |Wang Nongshen |王弄笙 | |Li Peng |Rabbie Namaliu | |- | |Yuan Zude |袁祖德 | |Li Peng |Julius Chan | |- | |Zhang Pengxiang (PRC diplomat) |張鵬翔 | |Li Peng |Julius Chan | |- | |Zhao Zhenyu |趙振宇 | |Zhu Rongji |Mekere Morauta | |- | |Li Zhengjun |李正君 | |Wen Jiabao |Michael Somare | |- | |Wei Ruixing |魏瑞兴 |1999: was appointed Consul General of P.R.China in Chicago |Wen Jiabao |Michael Somare | |- | |Qiu Bohua |仇伯华 |08 2003 to September 2008 Ambassador in Lesotho |Wen Jiabao |Michael Somare | |- | |Li Ruiyou |李瑞佑 |Oct. 15, 1985 Vice Consul |Li Keqiang |Peter O'Neill | |- | |Xue Bing (1965) |薛冰 |In 2008 he was Chargé d'affaires of the Chinese Ambassador to Kenya in Nairobi.
